<rule xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset" id="javax-to-jakarta-servlet-00043">
            <when>
                <or>
                    <javaclass references="javax.servlet.ServletContext.log(java.lang.Exception, java.lang.String)"/>
                </or>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="Method log(Exception, String) in javax.servlet.ServletContext has been removed">
                    <message>
                        Method log(Exception, String) in javax.servlet.ServletContext has been removed. Use log(String, Throwable) instead.
                    </message>
                    <link href="https://access.redhat.com/articles/6980265#servlet" title="Red Hat JBoss EAP Application Migration from Jakarta EE 8 to EE 10 - Jakarta Servlet"/>
                </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
